function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on real-time IAQ monitoring systems in real scenarios may lead to exposure to contagious diseases if proper precautions are not taken.","Impact":"Increased risk of indoor air pollutant-related illnesses and diseases due to lack of real-time monitoring and control.","Mitigation":"Implement strict protocols for monitoring and controlling IAQ in real scenarios, and provide training on proper usage of monitoring systems.","Technologies":"IoT-based real-time monitoring systems, deep learning prediction models, mobile app-based analysis tools.","People":"Occupants of buildings and indoor environments, especially in urban and village areas.","Owner":"Research institutions, government authorities, and building management organizations."},{"Description":"Increased exposure to indoor air pollutants in village areas due to the use of solid fuels, leading to higher risk of respiratory diseases and infections.","Impact":"Higher incidence of respiratory illnesses and diseases among people in village areas due to excessive exposure to solid fuels and indoor air pollutants.","Mitigation":"Develop cost-effective IAQ management systems tailored for village areas, promote the use of clean fuels and provide education on indoor air pollution control.","Technologies":"IoT-based monitoring systems, deep learning prediction models, mobile app-based analysis tools, clean fuel technologies.","People":"Residents of village areas, especially those using solid fuels for cooking and heating.","Owner":"Government authorities, public health organizations, and research institutions."},{"Description":"Lack of emphasis on designing suitable IAQ management systems for village areas may lead to neglecting the health of rural populations and hindering overall medical health improvement efforts.","Impact":"Neglecting the IAQ needs of village areas could lead to continued health challenges and hinder progress in improving medical health in rural populations.","Mitigation":"Conduct in-depth research on IAQ needs of village areas, integrate IoT and deep learning models for cost-effective solutions, and prioritize the development of suitable IAQ management systems for rural environments.","Technologies":"IoT-based monitoring systems, deep learning prediction models, mobile app-based analysis tools, clean fuel technologies.","People":"Residents of village areas, especially those using solid fuels for cooking and heating.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations, and government authorities."}]}
